faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long is the first aid course certificate valid?
faq.a1: The certificate is valid for 6 years and is required for obtaining a driver's license.
faq.q2: How much does the first aid course cost?
faq.a2: The course costs CHF 120.-. After booking, you will receive CHF 50.- cashback on your DriveLab Wallet.
faq.q3: How long does the course last?
faq.a3: The course lasts 10 hours, spread over two days: Day 1 from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM and Day 2 from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM (incl. 1h lunch break).
faq.a4: Yes, cancellations are free of charge up to 6 days before the course starts. For later cancellations, the full course fee will be charged.
faq.q5: What do I need to bring to the course?
faq.a5: Please bring a valid ID. All course materials will be provided.
